org.apache.flink.streaming.connectors.kafka

类 KafkaTableSource.Builder<T extends KafkaTableSource,B extends KafkaTableSource.Builder>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.streaming.connectors.kafka.KafkaTableSource.Builder<T,B>
  • 类型参数:
    T - Type of the KafkaTableSource produced by the builder.
    B - Type of the KafkaTableSource.Builder subclass.
    直接已知子类:
    KafkaAvroTableSource.Builder, KafkaJsonTableSource.Builder
    封闭类:
    KafkaTableSource

    protected abstract static class KafkaTableSource.Builder<T extends KafkaTableSource,B extends KafkaTableSource.Builder>
extends java.lang.Object
    Abstract builder for a KafkaTableSource to be extended by builders of subclasses of KafkaTableSource.

    • 字段概要

      字段 
      限定符和类型 字段和说明

      private java.lang.String proctimeAttribute

      private org.apache.flink.table.api.TableSchema schema 
      private java.util.Map<KafkaTopicPartition,java.lang.Long> specificStartupOffsets
      Specific startup offsets; only relevant when startup mode is StartupMode.SPECIFIC_OFFSETS.
      private StartupMode startupMode
      The startup mode for the contained consumer (default is StartupMode.GROUP_OFFSETS).
      private java.lang.String topic

      Configures a TableSource with optional parameters.
      B forTopic(java.lang.String topic)
      Sets the topic from which the table is read.
      B fromEarliest()
      Configures the TableSource to start reading from the earliest offset for all partitions.
      B fromGroupOffsets()
      Configures the TableSource to start reading from any committed group offsets found in Zookeeper / Kafka brokers.
      B fromLatest()
      Configures the TableSource to start reading from the latest offset for all partitions.
      B fromSpecificOffsets(java.util.Map<KafkaTopicPartition,java.lang.Long> specificStartupOffsets)
      Configures the TableSource to start reading partitions from specific offsets, set independently for each partition.

      Returns the configured Kafka properties.

      Returns the configured table schema.
      protected java.lang.String getTopic()
      Returns the configured topic.
      protected abstract boolean supportsKafkaTimestamps()
      True if the KafkaSource supports Kafka timestamps, false otherwise.

      Sets the configuration properties for the Kafka consumer.

      Configures the Kafka timestamp to be a rowtime attribute.

      Configures a field of the table to be a processing time attribute.

      Configures a field of the table to be a rowtime attribute.

      Sets the schema of the produced table.

    • 方法详细资料

      • forTopic

        public B forTopic(java.lang.String topic)
        Sets the topic from which the table is read.
        参数:
        topic - The topic from which the table is read.
        返回:
        The builder.

      • withKafkaProperties

        public B withKafkaProperties(java.util.Properties props)
        Sets the configuration properties for the Kafka consumer.
        参数:
        props - The configuration properties for the Kafka consumer.
        返回:
        The builder.

      • withSchema

        public B withSchema(org.apache.flink.table.api.TableSchema schema)
        Sets the schema of the produced table.
        参数:
        schema - The schema of the produced table.
        返回:
        The builder.

      • withProctimeAttribute

        public B withProctimeAttribute(java.lang.String proctimeAttribute)
        Configures a field of the table to be a processing time attribute. The configured field must be present in the tabel schema and of type Types.SQL_TIMESTAMP().
        参数:
        proctimeAttribute - The name of the processing time attribute in the table schema.
        返回:
        The builder.

      • withRowtimeAttribute

        public B withRowtimeAttribute(java.lang.String rowtimeAttribute,
                              org.apache.flink.table.sources.tsextractors.TimestampExtractor timestampExtractor,
                              org.apache.flink.table.sources.wmstrategies.WatermarkStrategy watermarkStrategy)
        Configures a field of the table to be a rowtime attribute. The configured field must be present in the tabel schema and of type Types.SQL_TIMESTAMP().
        参数:
        rowtimeAttribute - The name of the rowtime attribute in the table schema.
        timestampExtractor - The TimestampExtractor to extract the rowtime attribute from the physical type.
        watermarkStrategy - The WatermarkStrategy to generate watermarks for the rowtime attribute.
        返回:
        The builder.

      • withKafkaTimestampAsRowtimeAttribute

        public B withKafkaTimestampAsRowtimeAttribute(java.lang.String rowtimeAttribute,
                                              org.apache.flink.table.sources.wmstrategies.WatermarkStrategy watermarkStrategy)
        Configures the Kafka timestamp to be a rowtime attribute.

        Note: Kafka supports message timestamps only since version 0.10.

        参数:
        rowtimeAttribute - The name of the rowtime attribute in the table schema.
        watermarkStrategy - The WatermarkStrategy to generate watermarks for the rowtime attribute.
        返回:
        The builder.

      • fromEarliest

        public B fromEarliest()
        Configures the TableSource to start reading from the earliest offset for all partitions.
        另请参阅:
        FlinkKafkaConsumerBase.setStartFromEarliest()

      • fromLatest

        public B fromLatest()
        Configures the TableSource to start reading from the latest offset for all partitions.
        另请参阅:
        FlinkKafkaConsumerBase.setStartFromLatest()

      • fromGroupOffsets

        public B fromGroupOffsets()
        Configures the TableSource to start reading from any committed group offsets found in Zookeeper / Kafka brokers.
        另请参阅:
        FlinkKafkaConsumerBase.setStartFromGroupOffsets()

      • fromSpecificOffsets

        public B fromSpecificOffsets(java.util.Map<KafkaTopicPartition,java.lang.Long> specificStartupOffsets)
        Configures the TableSource to start reading partitions from specific offsets, set independently for each partition.
        参数:
        specificStartupOffsets - the specified offsets for partitions
        另请参阅:
        FlinkKafkaConsumerBase.setStartFromSpecificOffsets(Map)
